Uses of Class
org.marc4j.marc.ControlField

  • Packages that use ControlField 
    Package Description
    org.marc4j.marc
    This package contains a record object model to store and edit MARC records or parts of records as objects.

    • Uses of ControlField in org.marc4j.marc

      Methods in org.marc4j.marc that return ControlField 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static ControlField ControlField.copy​(ControlField original)
      Creates a copy of the original instance without copy the id attribute.
      ControlField Record.getControlField​(String tag)
      Returns the control field for the given tag.
      ControlField Record.getControlNumberField()
      Returns the control number field (tag 001).
      Methods in org.marc4j.marc that return types with arguments of type ControlField 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<ControlField> Record.getControlFieldList()
      Deprecated.
      Use Record.getControlFields()
      List<ControlField> Record.getControlFields()
      Returns the collection of control fields.
      Stream<ControlField> Record.getControlFieldsStream()
      Returns a stream of the control fields of this record
      Stream<ControlField> Record.getControlFieldsStream​(String tag)
      Returns a stream of the control fields of this record, that have the indicated tag
      Stream<ControlField> Record.getControlFieldsStreamPrefixedBy​(String tagPrefix)
      Returns a stream of the control fields of this record, that have the indicated tag or are prefixed by a tag value
      Methods in org.marc4j.marc with parameters of type ControlField 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Record.add​(ControlField field)
      Adds a new ControlField instance to the collection of variable fields.
      static ControlField ControlField.copy​(ControlField original)
      Creates a copy of the original instance without copy the id attribute.
      Method parameters in org.marc4j.marc with type arguments of type ControlField 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Record.setControlFieldList​(List<ControlField> newList)
      Deprecated.
      Use #setControlFields(List)
      void Record.setControlFields​(Collection<ControlField> newControlFields)
      Sets the collection of control fields.
      Constructors in org.marc4j.marc with parameters of type ControlField 
      Constructor Description
      ControlField​(ControlField other)
      Copy constructor Copy id attribute, so if you don't want has the same, use copy(ControlField).
